pr_title: Add API to check tenant availability.

timeline.message: Add API to check tenant availability.
Add API to get tenant by domain and check domain existance.

timeline.bodyText:
The method name and the response is contradicting, isn't it?
we return NOT_FOUND if the domain is available,
and
Return OK if the domain is not available
timeline.author: IsuraD

replies.bodyText: That has been the usual practice I saw in domain checking..   In google, if the email is available for us to be taken and not found in the system, they say it is available. Same with DNS domain registries. Here available implies it is available for sale or to be taken kind of.. WDYT?
